name: seeds-game
description: A connect the dots game with seeds

scripts.dev: npm run live & npm run css-watch & npm run js-watch
scripts.bundle: npm run make-elm && npm run css
scripts.prepare-assets: npm run bundle && npm run compress
scripts.add-changes: git add . && git commit -m 'prepare bundle' && git push origin gh-deploy
scripts.gh-pages-push: git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages-force-push: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix public gh-deploy`:gh-pages --force
scripts.gh-publish: git checkout gh-deploy && git merge master && npm run prepare-assets && npm run add-changes && npm run gh-pages-force-push && git checkout master

author: Andrew MacMurray
